page.title: 10King's School - Numbers.
page.content: The numbers at {King's School }in the Summer Term 1985 are 259 boarders, 23 day boys and 8 girls, making a total of 280. On other sites are the Preparatory School at Sparkford and the Pre-Prep at Ansford, so that the total numbers at the School in 1985 are in excess of 600. Headmaster - Mr G H G Doggart Second Master - Mr B P Wright Housemasters - Mr R S Lowe (Old House, 52 boarders, 16 day) Mr D J C Hindley (New House, 50 boarders, 4 day) Mr A B Leach (Priory House, 57 boarders) Mr R C F Hastings (Lyon House, 48 boarders, 2 day) Mr J N P Bennett (Blackford House, 54 boarders) Mr M H Cotterell (House Tutor, Wellesley House, 8 girl boarders)
